locationId.description:
This is an alphanumeric identifier used for Location/Facility Identification.
Example: YBZA
Note:
  • For HAL Shipment, Location ID is REQUIRED to ensure packages are delivered to the right location.
  • Use endpoint [Find Location] in [Location Search API], to find the correct location ID for your shipment.

personName.description:
Specify contact person name.
Recommended length is 70.
Note: There's no specific validation for the person name.
Example: John Taylor

emailAddress.description:
Specify contact email address. Maximum length is 80.
Example: sample@company.com

phoneNumber.description:
Specify contact phone number.
Minimum length is 10 and supports maximum of 15 for certain countries using longer phone numbers.
Note: Recommended Maximum length is 15 and there's no specific validation will be done for the phone number.
Example: 918xxxxx890

phoneExtension.description:
Specify contact phone extension.
Note: Recommended length is 6. There's no specific validation for the phone extension.
Example: 1234

faxNumber.description:
Specify contact fax number.
Note: Recommended length is 15. There's no specific validation for the fax number.
Example: 1234567890

companyName.description:
Specify contact company name.
Recommended length is 35.
Note: There's no specific validation for the company name.

contact.description: Indicate the contact details of the shipper.

streetLines.description:
This is the combination of number, street name, etc.
Note: At least one line is required and streetlines more than 3 will be ignored. Empty lines should not be included. Maximum length per line is 35.
Example: [10 FedEx Parkway, Suite 302, .etc.]

city.description:
This is a placeholder for City Name.
Note: This is conditional and not required in all the requests.
Note: It is recommended for Express shipments for the most accurate ODA and OPA surcharges.
Example: Beverly Hills

stateOrProvinceCode.description:
This is a placeholder for State or Province code.
Example: CA
click here to see State or Province Code

postalCode.description:
Indicate the Postal code. This is Optional for non postal-aware countries. Maximum length is 10.
Example: 65247
click here to see Postal aware countries

countryCode.description:
This is the two-letter country code.
Maximum length is 2.
Example: US
click here to see Country codes

residential.description: Indicate whether this address is residential (as opposed to commercial).

address.description: This is detailed information on physical location. May be used as an actual physical address (place to which one could go), or as a container of address parts which should be handled as a unit (such as a city-state-ZIP combination within the U.S.).

locationContactAndAddress.description: Specifies the contact and address details of a location.

locationType.description: Specifies the type of facility at which package/shipment is to be held.

description:
Use this object to specify required information for a shipment to be held at destination FedEx location.
Note: This object HoldAtLocationDetail is Required, when HOLD_AT_LOCATION is chosen in the specialServiceTypes.
